## Size.set() method

Updates in place the current Size from the given floats.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(width: number, height: number): Size;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  width | <code>number</code> | width to set |
|  height | <code>number</code> | height to set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Size`

the updated Size.
